LanguageData.JRWBaryonyx.label: Baryonyx
LanguageData.JRWBaryonyx.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #02872-1986 [BARYONYX WALKERI] CODENAME: HOOK >60
A spinosaurid with sharp front claws and an appetite for fish and flesh. They are as aggressive as they are quick and stop at nothing during the hunt.
